title: Вундеркинды
overview: Star intuition against children's talents!A game show in which a team of stars will play against a team of children and try to guess what unique talents each child has. For every correct answer, the stars get money, and for every wrong answer, the geeks get a cash prize.Stars donate their cash prizes to the Galchonok Charitable Foundation for Helping Children and Youth.The host of the project is Roman Kagramanov.
